message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement. To kick off our negotiations, I propose a price of $950000 for the product.

I appreciate your initial offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $850000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of the product and the benefits it will bring to my business.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. While I understand your position, I must respectfully decline. Our company has invested significantly in this product, and we believe it's worth more than what you've proposed. We would like to counter with an offer of $900000 for the product.

I understand your concerns, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and propose a price of $875000 for the product. I believe this is a more reasonable offer considering the market value and the benefits it will bring to my business.

Thank you for your latest proposal, Bob. We appreciate your willingness to negotiate. In light of our discussions, we are prepared to consider $890000 as a fair price for the product. We hope this aligns better with your expectations and allows us to move forward.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you at $880000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value and the benefits it will bring to my business.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. We understand your perspective and are willing to consider $885000 as a fair price for the product. We believe this price reflects both the market value and the benefits it will bring to your business.

I appreciate your persistence, Alice. However, I'm still not convinced that $885000 is the right price for the product. I'm willing to meet you at $880000, but I need to be convinced that this is the best deal I can get. Can you consider meeting me at $882000?

Thank you for your continued negotiation, Bob. We understand your position and are willing to consider $883000 as a fair price for the product. We believe this price reflects the value and benefits it will bring to your business.

I'm getting close to walking away, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $880000, but that's as low as I can go. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider buying from John for $1000000. I hope we can come to an agreement.
